body.name: MARVO Large Print Backlit Keyboard, WK712 Wired Computer Keyboard with 7 Colors & 11 Modes Backlight, Silent Light Up Keyboard with Tablet Phone Holder, Full-Size Gaming Keyboard for Windows, Mac
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 9 mins
features: Backlit keyboard offers 7 colors and 11 different modes of customizable options, helps improve visibility in dark ambient light and bring more fun.
The keyboard font is 4X Larger than standard keyboard, great for office workers, computer beginners, students, seniors, the visually impaired, etc.
Innovative design allows you to place your phone or tablet in the built-in 8.3inch cradle of this computer keyboard for better multitasking.
Wired keyboard features silent keys to provide an extremely quiet and comfortable typing experience, allowing you to type in quiet occasion.
Plug and play with 5.25ft USB-A cable, take away the hassle of power charging or replacing batteries, simple and easy setup without lagging.
The USB wired keyboard is widely compatible with both Windows and Mac OS, work with your PC Laptop.
MARVO offers a 12-month Worry-free warranty and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 11 FANCY BACKLIT EFFECTS Bring more fun to your daily typing and reduce fatigue from heavy work. Colorful Flow→Comet Trail→Monochrome Flow→Cloud Flow→Flicker→Monochromatic Wave→Rainbow→Breathing→7-Color Monochrome→Strobe→Neon Learn More 7 MONOCHROME BACKLIGHT COLORS Free to change the backlit color (7 colors optional) and brightness (8 levels optional), choose your favorite one. Learn More 8-LEVEL ADJUSTABLE BRIGHTNESS Allow you to type easily even in a dark environment with 8-level brightness. Learn More PNONE / TABLET HOLDER You can put your tablet or phone on the stand to multitask on other device while working. Keep your desk clean and tidy. Learn More 22 EFFICIENT SHORTCUT KEYS 16 combined keys, and 6 independent multimedia keys for higher efficient with less effort. Learn More

MARVO Model Comparison Phone/Tablet Holder RGB Backlight Multimedia Shortcut Numeric Keypad With Mouse Wired Wireless Or Wired Wireless Phone/Tablet Holder RGB Backlight Multimedia Shortcut Numeric Keypad With Mouse Wired Wireless Or Wired Wireless Phone/Tablet Holder RGB Backlight Multimedia Shortcut Numeric Keypad With Mouse Wired Wireless Or Wired Wireless

How to change the backlit color and brightness? Press "Fn + Mode key of M1~M9" or "Fn + Ins" to select the colors or modes, press arrow keys (up/down) to adjust brightness and (left/right) to adjust backlight breathing speed. Does this keyboard have function keys? Yes, there are 16 shortcut keys (Fn+F1~F12, Home/Email/Computer/Calculator) and 6 independent media keys. Will it lagging when typing? Simply plug the USB connector into your computer or laptop, and you can start typing immediately, there is no delay issue with cable connection. Does this wireless keyboard works with Windows and Mac OS? Compatible with Windows and Mac. You can switch between Windows and Mac simply and it works great on both. What if my keyboard don't work? Please contact the seller for further assistance firstly. We will be 100% responsible for each of our products and customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, husband loves it...
reviews.reviewText: So the other night my husband was typing in a comment on a car. I said are you writing a book? He said, this key board makes a bunch of noise when I type. Well, of course I decided to get this for him. He's 68 and really doesn't need big letters on his key board as he's a good typer. I'm not however, and although I have a lap top I sometimes need to go on there to complete forms etc. Surprise! He loves the lights and is ok with the big lettered keys and lets face it we aren't getting any younger. Plugged it in right away, it's quiet and SUPER! Definitely would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, style and quiet
reviews.reviewText: The large print is great for those who are visually challenged. The backlit board with several color options is not only fun it is functional. And finally the keys are quiet. Truly enjoy working on my computer again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just What I Needed
reviews.reviewText: Quiet, just bright enough. Just plug it in and go. Perfect. Only change I would make is to illuminate the media controls as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable to use
reviews.reviewText: I prefer the large letter keycaps and their mechanical feel. An excellent device.

reviews.reviewText: There were 2 keys off of the item, however, only 1 was in the packaging to be put back on, otherwise I'd be keeping it for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: True Plug and Play no downloads needed. Comfortable to use. If any negative issue - too many light and color options. Instructions involving those factors are 98% of the instructions. Really like the keyboard going to let the lights do what they are doing.
